resources.string: All features and services of the app have been disabled.

• Small change to show device admin. permission is required when opening app for the first time.\n • \"strings.xml\" file is available on Github for anyone wishing to translate this app. Link is given in the app page in Play Store.\n • Updated \"Other apps\" list.

• Small change to show device admin. permission is required for screen lock under "Wave-n-hold for screen off".
 • This app will now not work on devices without a proximity sensor.
 • Music Control Notification is now entirely a different service to avoid potential bugs.
 • Widget to turn off screen.

• Added much requested feature of checking Landscape mode in "Wave-n-hold for screen off"
 • Compatibility mode for ineligible devices
 • Changelog now shows history of all versions
 • Icon change for "Music volume control notification"
 • Added 'Other apps' section and option to rate the app.
 • UI revamp. Left sliding menu added. Circular app icon.
 • Android Nougat compatible. App shortcut to disable all features.

• Added changelog [ what you are seeing now ;) ]
 • Added a whole new "APP NOT WORKING?" section under Preferences
 • Fixed a bug in Music Volume Control notification
